name: TV Magic VR
description:
So  There's a new "magic" console out, apparently let's you go "into" the game?

You mean like... VR?

Well, It's a little confusing.

TV Magic VR is a unique puzzle platformer where throwing things at the TV is the recommended way to play!

  • Note: The in-game "controller" needs to be held by both hands to "play" the game within
  • Tested on Oculus Quest and on PC via Oculus Link 

Theme:  One Tool Many Uses, the "magic" TV lets you interact with games in a way we couldn't before.  You're only limited by the objects around you. (of which there are only 2 now, so you're still kind of limited)

Note To Players <3

  • Thank you for playing! The game is under active development so all of your feedback and opinions are very crucial! Please leave a comment to let us know your thoughts! What items would you like to "magically" pass through the screen?

Team

  • Amar - Game Designer, Programmer, last minute Artist
  • Enrico - 3D Artist
  • Gabriel - 2D Artist
  • Michael - Composer

This is a VR version of our game which recently won the Nordic Game Jam.  Some art and sound assets were reused, but the VR version was designed and built in 7 days for the VR 2020 Jam.
